text:
Going to see the ghost...?
Won't you stop us...? It's dark and all...

It'll be fine! We borrowed flashlights from the staff!
Apparently, it's by the stream up ahead.

Oh, Asahi-chan heard about it from the staff too?
…Well, alright, let's go.

Oh, Fuyuko-chan,
I'm a bit surprised you're up for something like this.

…………Yeah, a bit.
But I'm glad you seem unexpectedly okay with it too.

(Well, because what's ahead are fireflies. When the staff
said "ghost", it was just to get their attention.)

It'll be okay, Mei-chan!
If something comes up, I'll scare it away with this stick!

Thanks, Asahi-chan.
I'm grateful to have both of you here!
